description: Describes one or more Connect peers.

parameters.name: TransitGatewayConnectPeerIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Connect peers. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. The possible values are: state - The state of the Connect peer ( pending | available | deleting | deleted). transit-gateway-attachment-id - The ID of the attachment. transit-gateway-connect-peer-id - The ID of the Connect peer. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayConnectPeers
nested_items.description: Information about the Connect peers.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Connect attachment.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayConnectPeerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time.

nested_items.name: ConnectPeerConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Connect peer details.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAddress
nested_items.description: The Connect peer IP address on the transit gateway side of the tunnel.

nested_items.name: PeerAddress
nested_items.description: The Connect peer IP address on the appliance side of the tunnel.

nested_items.name: InsideCidrBlocks
nested_items.description: The range of interior BGP peer IP addresses.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The tunnel protocol.

nested_items.name: BgpConfigurations
nested_items.description: The BGP configuration details.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAsn
nested_items.description: The transit gateway Autonomous System Number (ASN).

nested_items.name: PeerAsn
nested_items.description: The peer Autonomous System Number (ASN).

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAddress
nested_items.description: The interior BGP peer IP address for the transit gateway.

nested_items.name: PeerAddress
nested_items.description: The interior BGP peer IP address for the appliance.

nested_items.name: BgpStatus
nested_items.description: The BGP status.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags for the Connect peer.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
